meanings.definition: Made by sewing together pieces of fabric or other material to form a larger piece.
meanings.sent1: The patchworked quilt was cozy and colorful.
meanings.sent2: She wore a patchworked skirt to the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The patchworked pillow looked like a rainbow exploded on it.
meanings.sent4: Her patchworked sweater was a mosaic of memories.
meanings.sent5: The patchworked blanket reminded her of her grandmother's love.

meanings.definition: Assembled or created from various parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The patchworked schedule included tasks from different departments.
meanings.sent2: The patchworked team managed to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: His patchworked story about aliens and dinosaurs made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The patchworked map led them through uncharted territories.
meanings.sent5: The patchworked puzzle was challenging but rewarding to complete.
